meanings.definition: A festive meal or party, especially one where beans are served.
meanings.sent1: We had a delightful beanfeasts last night with all our friends.
meanings.sent2: The annual company picnic turned into a beanfeasts with lots of delicious food.
meanings.sent3: The beanfeasts at the park was so fun, we even had a bean bag toss game!
meanings.sent4: The family reunion felt like a beanfeasts, everyone brought their favorite dishes.
meanings.sent5: The wedding reception was a beanfeasts to remember, with bean soup and bean salad.

meanings.definition: A celebration or gathering characterized by abundant food and drink.
meanings.sent1: The neighborhood block party was a true beanfeasts with endless treats.
meanings.sent2: The holiday feast was a beanfeasts with a variety of dishes for everyone.
meanings.sent3: The office potluck turned into a beanfeasts, with so much food we couldn't finish it all.
meanings.sent4: The music festival was a beanfeasts of flavors, from spicy to sweet.
meanings.sent5: The birthday bash was a beanfeasts with a buffet of tasty delights for all guests.
